content: anyone up for a little crochet-along this cat was one of the very first toys i ever made back in 2012 and i d forgotten all about it but it s such an easy and fun pattern and i thought maybe you d like to join me in making some cute kitties this is a great pattern for beginner toy makers and works up using just single_crochet stitches plus i finally made my very first video showing the process from start to finish so if you re new to this amigurumi business it s easy to follow along i will split the pattern into two parts with part one 1 coming on monday march 30th and part two 2 on wednesday april 1st there will be a written pattern on my blog 3 and a video on youtube 4 1 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/long-legged-cat-cal-part-1 2 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/cal-long-legged-cat-part-2 3 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news 4 https //www youtube com/channel/uc90u98imfqyxdcw0v3babvg
